revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{suffix|en|yes|able}} ===Adjective=== {{en-adj}} # That can be agreed to. #* '''1995''', Matthew McKay, Martha Davis, Patrick Fanning, ''How to communicate'' (page 161) #*: A '''yesable''' proposal is one of your acceptable options stated as a direct question to which "yes" is an easy answer. ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=abeelsy|Beasley|Belyeas|besayle}} [[Category:English 3-syllable words]]
